response_requirements.initial_response_description: Records Access Officer must respond within 10 business days (excludes Saturdays, Sundays, legal holidays, or unexpected closures)
response_requirements.final_response_notes: Additional 15 business days allowed after payment for record production (total 25 business days from payment)
response_requirements.extension_notes: 15 business days after fee payment for production; day after 5 PM considered received next day

fee_structure.search_fee_notes: Enhanced 2017 law established limits on fees; may charge for search and redaction
fee_structure.copy_fee_notes: Actual cost of copying; 2017 law limited fee amounts
fee_structure.fee_estimate_required: Must provide fee estimate for complex requests

exemptions.description: Records specifically exempted by statute including 26 categories in definition section
Personnel and medical files or information where disclosure may constitute unwarranted invasion of privacy
Investigatory materials compiled for law enforcement purposes
Attorney-client privileged communications and attorney work product
Trade secrets and confidential commercial information
Inter-agency or intra-agency memoranda relating to policy positions being developed

appeal_process.first_level_notes: Appeal to Supervisor of Records at Secretary of the Commonwealth; Supervisor has authority to order compliance
appeal_process.attorney_fees_notes: Potential damages and attorney fees for violations

requester_requirements.request_format_notes: No specific format required; may be oral or written (written recommended)

agency_obligations.records_officer_notes: Must designate Records Access Officer (RAO) to coordinate responses
agency_obligations.response_format_options: Must provide fee estimate for complex requests
agency_obligations.denial_requirements: Must detail specific basis for withholding and cite exemptions relied upon

oversight_body.name: Supervisor of Records - Secretary of the Commonwealth
oversight_body.role: Primary appeal authority; orders compliance with public records law
oversight_body.contact_info: State House, Room 337, Boston, MA 02133; Phone: (617) 727-2832; Email: pre@sec.state.ma.us

validation_metadata.verification_notes: All fields manually verified from official Massachusetts statute. Enhanced 2017 law. 10 business day response by RAO; 15 additional days after payment for production. Records Access Officer required. Supervisor of Records appeal authority with compliance orders. Superior Court judicial review. Enhanced fee limitations since 2017. Denial must detail basis and cite specific exemptions.
